data.message:
Just a suggestion. Please provide in future updates a way for users to lock their post. Either as the original post or as a post in a thread. Sometimes you just want to make a statement without getting a bunch of replies. Yes, abuse of this is a small chance but most people want response so they would use this locking choice sparingly. But, it is desireable.
As things stand, I have to delete and repost until people get the message I don't want any reply.

replies.message: Thanks for your suggestion, Michael! We'll go ahead and share your feedback with our team. -Jessica
Thanks Jessica for your fast response. Have a good day. 😃
Yeah fast response but no action.
